message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to show you this amazing product! I'm looking to sell it to you for $15000. It's a one-of-a-kind item that I'm sure you'll love.
Hello Alice, thank you for offering me the product. I appreciate your enthusiasm, but I believe I can find a better deal elsewhere. I am willing to pay up to $14000 for the product.

counteroffer: I appreciate your interest, Bob. However, I'm not willing to go as low as $14000. I'm thinking more along the lines of $16000. I believe the product is worth every penny, and I'm confident you'll find it's a great investment.

message: I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob, but I'm not willing to budge from $16000. However, I'm willing to throw in some extras to sweeten the deal. I'll include a one-year warranty and a personalized setup service. What do you think?
Hello Alice, I appreciate the additional perks you're offering, but I still believe we can come to an agreement closer to my budget. I'm willing to pay up to $15000 for the product.

counteroffer: I understand you're trying to stay within your budget, Bob, but I'm not willing to go as low as $15000. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $15500. I'll throw in an additional accessory that complements the product perfectly, and I'm confident it's worth the extra cost.

message: I'm glad we're getting closer, Bob! I'm willing to make one more concession. I'll meet you at $15000, but I need to get the accessories I mentioned earlier, and I'll also include a premium support package for a year. This way, you'll get the best value for your investment. What do you think?
